headline: LEYBOLD ROTARY VANE PUMP 14.1 CFM
description: Single Stage Rotary Vane Pump        Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise.  All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor.  Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.  Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.    Leybold S16A
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model S16A
Pumping Speed 14.1 CFM (398.4 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 2.00E-2(En) torr (2.67E-2 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Refurbished YES
Two-Stage YES
Motor Horsepower 1 HP
Oil Capacity Minimum: 1.18 L (1.25 qt, 0.26 Br gal)
Power Requirements 208/230 V 60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 8.000 in (20.3 cm)
Depth 23.000 in (58.4 cm)
Height 12.000 in (30.5 cm)
Weight 85 lb (39 kg)
